content: I think we should open compose message box by default, when a stream is selected instead when user click on new topic. Also change wording of "new topic" to "send message" or something like that ? New users find it difficult to send messages.
Or maybe highlight the compose box a bit more in some way. I don't have a design in mind but i think there is a need for this
Your grammar is confusing me here: "when a stream is selected instead when user click on new topic".

There are two ways to open compose box.

  • One to click on a message
  • Another is on clicking on "New Topic" button.

I suggest we should open compose box by default (no need of clicking new topic button or clicking the message ) when a user is in a single stream narrow. For "All messages" or in any view where there are multiple stream messages being displayed we can hide the compose box.
Also wording for "New topic" button can be changes to "New message" maybe?

The main tradeoff with opening the compose box automatically is that keys like n stop working. We've had many iterations of changing this behavior, so I don't we're likely to change it at this point.

I think the reason we say "New topic" is to encourage using that button only when you really are starting a new topic. The rest of the time we want people to be more in reply-to-message mode.
I wish we made the "Reply" button more prominent.
Yeah, there's a big downside for hotkeys of having the compose box open (well, we could have it open but not focused, but that would feel pretty annoying as well)
